projects.title: AWS Infrastructure Automation
projects.bodyText:
- Automated the deployment and management of AWS infrastructure using **Terraform** and **Ansible**.
 - Configured and maintained **CI/CD pipelines** with Jenkins for automated deployments.
 - Implemented monitoring and alerting with **Prometheus** and **Grafana**.

projects.title: Microservices Deployment on Kubernetes
projects.bodyText:
- Deployed a microservices architecture using **Kubernetes** on AWS EKS.
 - Containerized applications with **Docker**, managing images and registries.
 - Implemented **Ingress** for load balancing and **Service Mesh** for traffic management.

projects.title: Secure Chat Application Deployment
projects.bodyText:
- Managed the deployment of a secure chat application on **AWS EC2** instances.
 - Utilized **IAM**, **VPC**, and **Security Groups** for secure network architecture.
 - Implemented **SSL/TLS** encryption and monitored application performance with **New Relic**.

projects.title: Continuous Integration and Deployment Pipeline
projects.bodyText:
- Built and optimized CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins**, integrated with **SonarQube** for code quality checks.
 - Managed artifacts using **Nexus3** and coordinated deployments with **Ansible**.
 - Conducted regular **security scans** with **Trivy** and implemented automated tests.

projects.title: QuickBooks Application Deployment
projects.bodyText:
- Deployed QuickBooks application on **AWS EC2** instances within a secure VPC.
 - Configured **VPN** and managed **Windows Server** and **Linux** environments.
 - Ensured data security and network integrity with **AWS Security Groups** and **Route Tables**.
